spells.name: Air Walk
spells.description: Subject treads on air as if solid (climb or descend at 45-degree angle).

spells.name: Chaos Hammer
spells.description: Harms and slows lawful creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

spells.name: Control Water
spells.description: Raises or lowers bodies of water.

spells.name: Cure Critical Wounds
spells.description: Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.description: Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

spells.name: Dimensional Anchor
spells.description: Bars extradimensional movement.

spells.name: Discern Lies
spells.description: Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

spells.name: Dismissal
spells.description: Forces a creature to return to native plane.

spells.name: Divination
spells.description: Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

spells.name: Divine Power
spells.description: You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to movement.

spells.name: Giant Vermin
spells.description: Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

spells.name: Holy Smite
spells.description: Harms and possibly blinds evil creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

spells.name: Imbue with Spell Ability
spells.description: Transfer spells to subject.

spells.name: Inflict Critical Wounds
spells.description: Touch attack, 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

spells.name: Magic Weapon, Greater
spells.description: Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).

spells.name: Neutralize Poison
spells.description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

spells.name: Order's Wrath
spells.description: Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

spells.name: Planar Ally, Lesser
spells.description: Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

spells.name: Poison
spells.description: Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

spells.name: Repel Vermin
spells.description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

spells.name: Restoration
spells.description: Restores level and ability score drains.

spells.name: Sending
spells.description: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

spells.name: Spell Immunity
spells.description: Subject is immune to one spell per 4 levels.

spells.name: Summon Monster IV
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.description: Speak and understand any language.

spells.name: Unholy Blight
spells.description: Harms and sickens good creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
